description: This file defines a Flutter widget for the login screen of a mobile application. It includes UI elements such as email and password input fields, a remember me checkbox, login button, and navigation links. It handles user input validation, mock login process, and navigation to other screens.

classes.name: LoginScreen
classes.description: A stateful widget that presents the login interface, managing form state, input controllers, and user interactions.

classes.name: _LoginScreenState
classes.description: State class for LoginScreen, handling UI rendering, form validation, and login logic.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of text controllers when the widget is removed from the widget tree.

methods.name: _submit
methods.description: Validates the form, simulates a login delay, shows a snack bar, and navigates to the home screen upon login.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the login screen UI.

methods.name: _headerAppBar
methods.description: Creates a styled AppBar widget with the app title.

methods.name: _heroBackground
methods.description: Creates a container with a gradient background for the login screen.
